title: I got kicked out of a game
body: I can not log back in and there is nothing wrong with my internet. Why is this happening? Now, my team who was talking about reporting me without a reason has a reason now thanks to your servers.

replies.body: While there was [maintenance ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)this morning, the servers have still been online with exception to ranked games.  Ranked was disabled at 2016/07/20 04:00 PDT, and appears to be on-going for the moment this morning.  If you are experiencing issues logging on, please go over our[ connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to make sure there isn't a snag with your network reaching our server.
Same happened to me and now I got leaverbuster because i couldn't reconnect.
Same thing happened to me. RIght after i finished a game so i presume im safe but was this a server crash or something?

I'd guess they were fiddling with networking and may have pulled the plug, hit a snag, etc. My game ended too, and I wasn't penalized. Other people, however, weren't so lucky. I think they'll get around to helping out those who were penalized unjustly, but in the mean time they're probably preparing an explanation of sorts.

> [{quoted}](name=Ezoroth Roze,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Twc4jmXt,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-07-20T12:38:57.816+0000)
>
> I'd guess they were fiddling with networking and may have pulled the plug, hit a snag, etc. My game ended too, and I wasn't penalized. Other people, however, weren't so lucky. I think they'll get around to helping out those who were penalized unjustly, but in the mean time they're probably preparing an explanation of sorts.

Lucky for you...i got penalized and got a leaverbuster when the game clearly disconnect and wont allow me to reconnect.

You're not the only one. Game froze for me, attempted to reconnect, never did. I restarted the client, and got stuck in a login queue...while still in a game. Then when it was my turn, got an error about no server response. Got back in game just to see our team lose a 4v3 since two others got booted too. Now the game is over, but can't start a new one. Got an error saying I'm still attached to an active game. Server status says the servers are up, however a previous message says ranked is disabled for maintenance. As for as I can tell, they never fully took everything offline, they're likely just tinkering with it while people are still playing. I wouldn't worry too much. It's goofy as hell, but doubt you'll get punished for it.

edit: It's been about 10 min, but game finally let me log in (after booting me again). So far it's letting me queue, issue on the server end must be resolved.
Great....now I have leaverbuster when i wasnt clearly or remotely leave the game as the game disconnect and prevent me to log-in. =_=
I think it was a server blip. I got back into the client and am in queue for a game now, give it a go.
me too, this is kinda maintenance i guess
You shouldn't get reported because this happened to everyone. I am having the same issues that you are having.
same here...i was in-game then i got kick out from game and now having error log in to game.
